r.d: Retrieve RPM information using librpm. Available functions: - rpmvercmp to compare 2 EVRs - rpminfo to retrieve information from a RPM file - rpmdbinfo to rerieve information from an installed RPM - rpmdbsearch to search installed RPMs
r.n: - allow search by Pkgid, Hdrid, Installtid with specific input - fix search with various other tags (Version, ...)
